text: Governance is the process that ensures effective and compliant workflow
without giving up flexibility to achieve its goals.
In the cloud,
customers use governance as a guardrail to fine-tune automation
and detailed access controls to align with their compliance and policy needs
making it easier to customize for each use case;
and there's an array of AWS services to help.
CloudTrail
enables compliance, operational auditing, and risk auditing.
Control Tower
allows one to set up and govern a secure compliant multi-account environment.
CloudWatch
monitors resources and applications.
AWS CloudFormation simplifies management of the entire lifecycle of applications and infrastructure at scale
in any environment.
AWS Config
helps assess, audit, and evaluate the configurations of resources.
AWS Organizations
centralizes billing, control access, compliance, and security.
AWS Trusted Advisor
analyzes the environment and provides best practice recommendations.
With strong Governance, Monitoring Security Policy and Compliance, and the right tools
customers don't have to choose between innovation and control,
they can have both.
To learn more about Governance
go to aws.amazon.com/security.
